title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-8.1 - Cessions of jurisdiction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-8.1 - Cessions of jurisdiction

State Regulations

The Commissioner of General Services may make cessions of
jurisdiction involving the United States of America on State-owned lands
underwater pursuant to the procedures set forth in section
75
(8)
of the Public Lands Law and article 3 of
the State Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
270-8.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
